rules_text:
Flying
[i]Whiz[/i] – Whenever an instant or sorcery card is put into your graveyard, if it wasn’t cast, Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
notes:

OG_4:
Used old whiz text, didn’t have flying

OG_3:
Opponents lose 1 life.

OG_2:
Creates a 1/1 black elemental with decayed.

OG_1:
Creates a 1/1 black bird with flying and decayed.
